#summary Quick guide to start using guasax framework .

= Introduction =

A more complete quickstart is coming soon in [http://www.guasax.com]

= Adding guasax library =

Create a new Flex project in Flex Builder.

Create a lib directory in your Flex project

Extract to lib directory the content of guasaxlib-0.9.zip (it contents the guasaxlib.swc file)

On the project name in the project navigator, right click and select Properties.

On the left, select "Flex Build Path".

Select "Library path" tab.

Click the "Add SWC" button.

Browse in the filesystem to locate the guasaxlib.swc file where you had extracted it from guasaxlib-0.9.zip.

Press "OK" to commit your changes. 

Then you ought to create a locale folder (in your project root), and inside it another one called en_US. In other words, you must create the next skeleton:

+ROOT-PROJECT-FOLDER
      |
     +*locale*
             |
            +*en_US*

Crear el directorio locale/en_US en tu raiz y añadir el fichero de mensajes de guasax (GuasaxMessages.properties)

Editar las propiedades del proyecto y en la opcion Flex Compiler añadir en los argumentos la siguiente linea:

-source-path+=../locale/{locale} -locale=en_US
